hasPart.text: {"$schema":"https://json-schema.org/draft/2020-12/schema","title":"EscalationMatrix","description":"Dataset schema for defining escalation paths and notes for various issues in the SEBI NRI Re-KYC Geo-Tag Relaxation context.","type":"object","properties":{"escalation_matrix":{"type":"array","description":"List of escalation items with responsible lines and notes.","items":{"type":"object","properties":{"id":{"type":"integer","description":"Unique row identifier"},"issue":{"type":"string","description":"Type of issue encountered during Re-KYC"},"first_line":{"type":"string","description":"First line of escalation or responsibility"},"second_line":{"type":"string","description":"Second line of escalation or responsibility"},"notes":{"type":"string","description":"Additional notes, compliance triggers, or documentation steps"}},"required":["id","issue","first_line","second_line","notes"]}}},"required":["escalation_matrix"],"examples":[{"escalation_matrix":[{"id":1,"issue":"GPS/PoA Mismatch","first_line":"KYC Operations","second_line":"Compliance + AML","notes":"If unresolved → consider SAR if AML threshold met"},{"id":2,"issue":"Spoofed IP / Suspicious Attempts","first_line":"Tech Ops","second_line":"Security + Legal","notes":"Preserve packet logs; update IP reputation lists"},{"id":3,"issue":"Regulator Query","first_line":"Compliance","second_line":"Legal / Senior Mgmt","notes":"Include timestamps, logs, sample records"}]}]}
